name: Dr. Siddiqur Rahman
description: Consultant & Surgeon, Refractive Surgery Department, Vision Eye Hospital Visiting Professor, Northern International Medical College Hospital Managing Director, Vision Eye Hospital. Surgical Specialties: Refractive and Glaucoma Clinical Area Glaucoma: Trabeculectomy, Trabeculotomy, Glaucoma Valve Implant, Laser Procedures . Cataract Surgery: Phacoimulsification (all age groups including complex and congenital cataract) using Monofocal, Aspheric, Multifocal, Trifocal, and Toric IOL Laser DCR. Refractive Surgery: LASIK, SMILE, ICL/IPCL Implant, Collagen Crosslinking (CXL/C3R).
